testcase.name: Creating a loan for a client
testcase.system-out: Given user logged in to the website.........................................passed When user navigate to the Clients menu and select "Client"..................passed And user open the create client and fills the details "PERSON" , "Manikandan","6111111807","number:51","Merchant","selvam","Father","Current","amd".passed And user activates the client...............................................passed And user creates new client and fills the form "Personal loan" , "<Loan_Account_Type>" ,"Cash/Cheque".passed And user fill in mandatory values on the "Terms" page:......................passed And user navigate through lenders "saa" and charges page....................passed And user review the loan summary "Submitted and pending approval"...........passed Then the loan should be created successfully "Approved"....................passed
